info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 27 at 5:28PM EDT until May 27 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CUMBERLAND...NORTHWESTERN GOOCHLAND AND SOUTHEASTERN FLUVANNA COUNTIES... At 528 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lakeside Village, or near Fork Union, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Cartersville and Duncan around 540 PM EDT. Columbia around 545 PM EDT. Fife around 550 PM EDT. Kents Store around 600 PM EDT. Hadensville around 605 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Elk Hill, Whiteville, Sandy Hook, Stage Junction, Georges Tavern, Tabscott, Othma, Three Square, Pemberton and Trenton Mills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
